biography: Rasmus, a familiar name at Vihti Golf Club, is known for his calm demeanor on the course. While Rasmus has officially retired from Hector Trophée events, his influence remains palpable.

He participated in the tournament once, bringing a level of strategic play that was appreciated by fellow competitors and spectators alike. Although the coveted Hector Trophée and Victor Trophy eluded him, his presence added a certain gravitas to the competition.
Despite his departure from the competitive circuit, it is always possible that Rasmus might return in the future.
